byline: Mark Garrison, Kai Ryssdal, D Gorenstein, Gigi Douban, Robert Reich, Sam Beard and Amy Scott
title: Marketplace for Wednesday, May 8, 2013
description: JP Morgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon is shopping for votes lately in a bid to keep his other title: chairman of the board. How's his campaign going? In losses -- and not the stock market kind -- Manchester United is losing its longtime leader. We look at how a global brand manages that transition. Plus, historical homes are getting attacked by the paparazzi of the public, thanks to social photo sharing sites like Instagram.
